name: Distortion (cc7imm7, MelodySF, beijubird)
description:
This is a top-down shooting game. The vision will be distorted during the game.  Try to survive as long as possible in an area. 

========CONTROL========

WASD - Movement

L Click - Shoot

R Click - Shoot a bomb

========MATES========

programmer : cc7imm7

Art : beijubird

Audio : MelodySF
